text: Curcy Hendricks Andrews, Jr., known as Bud Andrews (July 5, 1940 - August 30, 2014) was an American DJ. He worked at Radio KDAV in Lubbock, Texas. In 1970 he said to have "discovered" the Mississippi-based humorist Jerry Clower. Andrews died in Lubbock, Texas, aged 74. ==References== Category:1940 births Category:2014 deaths Category:American radio personalities Category:Entertainers from Texas Category:People from Lubbock, Texas
title: Bud Andrews
